import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private router: Router) { } gotoHome() { this.router.navigate(['/home']); // define your component where you want to go } }

The Book Den is a quaint and cozy haven for bibliophiles. Here, you'll find a vast collection of books, covering a range of genres, topics, and interests. Whether you're looking for a classic novel, a cookbook, a travel guide, or a children's storybook, you're sure to find something that piques your curiosity

  • Home
  • Books
  • About
  • Contact
